title:
Generalized square function estimates for curves and their conical
  extensions
abstract:
We show sharp square function estimates for curves in the plane whose
curvature degenerates at a point and estimates sharp up to endpoints for cones
over these curves. To this end, for curves of finite type we extend the
classical C\'ordoba--Fefferman biorthogonality. For cones over degenerate
curves, we analyze wave envelope estimates proved via High-Low-decomposition.
The arguments are subsequently extended to the cone over the complex parabola.
